page.syntax: OutputString as C = ui_get_font([C title [,C font [,L styles [,L generate_expression [,C tables ]]]]])

argument.name: OutputString
argument.description: The font name, point size, and style (if selected).

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. Default = "Select Font". The title of the dialog box.

page.description: Prompt the user for a font. Returns the font name selected. If Styles = .t. then prompts for text style.
page.discussion: The UI_GET_FONT() function displays a font and point size selection dialog box with a preview window. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
